short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drink Water (Jal Lijiye) is an extension that will remind you drink water after every 20 mins.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drink Water (Jal Lijiye) is an extension which will help you to stay hydrated.

## What social Drink Water (Jal Lijiye) does:

★ It will play sound after every 20 minutes which will remind you to drink water.

## How to use it ?

★ Just click on extension after installing it and leave it, it will start playing sound automatically after every 20 minutes.
